title: problema di apertura LOL
body:
good day everybody,

when i started a game, an uploading of windows 10 started immediatly.
just when it finished i opened LOL and it sad that the pvp.net was closed, and i retry more and more times, but it repeats.
then i disinstalled  LOL and i reinstalled LOL, when it finished i opended it and the program sad that i have to check the internet connection and the computer's firewall.
please help me, it repeats any times that i open LOL.
(sorry for the orrible english, but i'm italian)

replies.body:
Questo Ã¨ il forum italiano, puoi scrivere in italiano :)

Per il firewall puoi dare un'occhiata qui: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/it/articles/201752664-Risolvere-i-problemi-di-connessione#wq2
